pages.title: Kamen Rider Sylphi
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Gaim Gaiden: Kamen Rider Gridon VS Kamen Rider Bravo (2020, web series)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/sengoku_driver#sengoku_driver_sylphi)Sengoku Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Sengoku Driver user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Resistance II$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength III
